findings.description: Endpoint accessible without authentication
findings.remediation: Implement proper authentication checks

findings.description: CORS policy allows all origins (*)
findings.remediation: Restrict CORS to specific trusted origins

findings.description: CORS allows credentials with wildcard origin (*)
findings.remediation: Do not use '*' with credentials; specify exact allowed origins

findings.description: No rate limiting detected - 30 requests in 0.04s
findings.remediation: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse
